thread.title: Is Buying Cuban Software Legal In the US? The Answer is Hazy
thread.title_full: Is Buying Cuban Software Legal In the US? The Answer is Hazy

author: timothy
title: Is Buying Cuban Software Legal In the US? The Answer is Hazy
text: on Monday October 26, 2015 @12:31PM from the natural-leaf-apps-from-havana dept. lpress writes: The Treasury Department recently issued new regulations authorizing "the importation of Cuban-origin mobile applications and the employment of Cuban nationals by persons subject to U.S. jurisdiction to develop such mobile applications." Great, but that is ambiguous, so I asked Treasury some follow-up questions: why is the rule restricted to mobile apps, what is the definition of a mobile app and can the Cuban developer work for a Cuban cooperative or government enterprise or must it be an individual? The answers were mostly "no comment" so the best way to clarify the situation is to try it and see what happens.
